Create a hit map which associates a charged particle to it's hits in the recoil tracker.

std::vector< int >  hitCount 
) [private]

Given a set of hits, check if a sim particle is expected to fall within the acceptance of the recoil tracker.

Parameters:
result The object used to encapsulate the results.
hitCount Vector indicating whether the nth layer of the recoil tracker has a hit.

void ldmx::FindableTrackProcessor::produce ( Event &  event  )  [virtual]

Run the processor and create a collection of results which indicate if a charge particle can be found by the recoil tracker.

Parameters:
event The event to process.

Implements ldmx::Producer.

00030         if (simParticles->GetEntriesFast() == 0) return;

00045             // If the sim particle is neutral, skip it.

00061             }
